full_summary:
# Advance Contract Award Notice
## Title
ACAN - Freeze Dryer Systems

## Reference Number
WS4341939779-Doc4505608924

## Solicitation Number
WS4341939779

## Tender Status
Expired

## Mandatory Trade Agreements
The provision of this contract is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

## Region of Delivery
The region of delivery is the National Capital Region (NCR) with a specific location in Ottawa, ON.

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the delivery address is 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5.

## End User Entities
The end-user entities for this contract are the Parks Canada Agency (PC) with a specific address of 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3.

## Contract Description
Parks Canada requires two vacuum freeze dryer systems. One system will have a larger capacity, and the other will have a smaller capacity. The systems are needed for the treatment of wet and waterlogged organic materials at the Objects Laboratory and Marine Conservation Team in Ottawa, ON. The contract includes all hardware, cabling and power components, accessories and peripherals, manuals and technical documents, installation, training, and a one-year warranty, including maintenance and support services.

## Evaluation and Award
This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), and suppliers can indicate their interest in bidding by submitting a statement of capabilities. If no supplier meets the requirements, the contracting officer may proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.

## Contact Information
Please contact Stephen Van Den Hanenburg from the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at stephen.vandenhanenberg@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for more information.

## Tender Note
The notice URL is provided for supplier convenience: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19203060?extsite=MTkyMDMwNjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
